reviewText: Perfect for winding down to meditate or relax. Thank you!
It is pretty. It would be better on a wide screen TV.
I use this as a backdrop to accompany ambient music I make in my studio. Helps to really set the mood.
This is a gift for birthday. I've had a hard time not pre-viewing it. Still 10 days to go, it's killing me.

Love the sound & kaleidoscope patterns as it has the effect of making one peaceful. Although the imagery is clear I found the DVD had faults about 2/3rds towards the end where it just stops/starts/stops & can't get it to finish so that was disappointing.
